Introduction

Taeseon is a South Korean trainee and singer under YM Entertainment and Eighty6. He is a member of the upcoming boy group UNNAME. He was member of the upcoming Japanese project boy group MY BOYZ and a former member of the boy group TRCNG. He is best known for being a contestant on the survival shows Peak Time and Fantasy Boys.
